endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: An astronaut riding a rainbow unicorn

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: An astronaut riding a rainbow unicorn

parameters.name: img2img

param_schema.title: Img2Img
param_schema.description: Use img2img pipeline, it will use the image input both as the control image and the base image.

parameters.description: Use img2img pipeline, it will use the image input both as the control image and the base image.

parameters.name: strength

param_schema.title: Strength
param_schema.description: When img2img is active, the denoising strength. 1 means total destruction of the input image.

parameters.description: When img2img is active, the denoising strength. 1 means total destruction of the input image.

parameters.name: remove_bg

param_schema.title: Remove Bg
param_schema.description: Remove background from the input image

parameters.description: Remove background from the input image

parameters.name: lora_scale

param_schema.title: Lora Scale
param_schema.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.name: lora_weights

param_schema.title: Lora Weights
param_schema.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.name: condition_scale

param_schema.title: Condition Scale
param_schema.description: The bigger this number is, the more ControlNet interferes

parameters.description: The bigger this number is, the more ControlNet interferes

parameters.name: auto_generate_caption

param_schema.title: Auto Generate Caption
param_schema.description: Use BLIP to generate captions for the input images

parameters.description: Use BLIP to generate captions for the input images
